ygData.subject: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail my friends.  I am new to the clerical ranks and had a question about weapons.  I ve read a few guides though there seems to be some conflict on weapons.
ygData.messageBody:
Hail my friends. I am new to the clerical ranks and
had a question about weapons. I've read a few guides
though there seems to be some conflict on weapons.
Some guides say one-handed blunt, another say
two-handed blunt, and lastly, some say both. I would
just like to know what everyone else thinks on the
subject. Any other tips (as in armor, spells,
hunting, etc) for a young dwarven clerics (lvl4) would
be great too. Thanks.

Niomar, Dwarven Cleric of Xegony


=====
